job.title: Test Automation Software Engineer
job.description: stronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongImportant Note During the application process ensure your contact information email and phone number is up to date and upload your current resume when submitting your application for consideration To participate in some selection activities you will need to respond to an invitation The invitation can be sent by both email and text message In order to receive text message invitations your profile must include a mobile phone number designated as Personal Cell or Cellular in the contact information of your applicationbrbrAt Wells Fargo we are looking for talented people who will put our customers at the center of everything we do We are seeking candidates who embrace diversity equity and inclusion in a workplace where everyone feels valued and inspiredbrbrHelp us build a better Wells Fargo It all begins with outstanding talent It all begins with youbrbrTechnology sets IT strategy enhances the design development and operations of our systems optimizes the Wells Fargo infrastructure provides information security and enables Wells Fargo global customers to have 24 hours a day 7 days a week banking access through inbranch online ATMs and other channelsbrbrOur mission is to deliver stable secure scalable and innovative services at speeds that delight and satisfy our customers and unleash the skills potential of our employeesbrbrThis position will support the Credit and Retail Services businesses Credit Card and Retail Services within the Credit and Retail Services Technology organization This position may also support other lines of business where shared platforms existbrCard and Retail Services is a growth area within Wells Fargo Key element of the growth strategy is to develop new credit card products and grow the Cobranded credit card portfolio To enable the growth several Technology areas with Card Technology Digital and Enterprise Technology have to come together to deliver E2E solution This role will be well suited for an individual with proven success in strong technology delivery experience that has been gained on top of past handson technology solutions crafting and delivery This role will partner with line of business partners and translate the business needs to various technology groups within Wells Fargo and Third Party Solutions providers and orchestrate activities to have EndtoEnd solutions in place and deliver itbrbrstronguPrimary Duties amp Responsibilitiesbrustrongul liLead software engineer in designing coding testing debugging and documenting programstest scenarios using Agile development practicesli liProvide crossfunctional and crossorganizational coordination of endtoend test automation for projectsli liFunctionalOperational technical team lead for automated endtoend testing leveraging the Wells Fargo Test Automation Frameworkli liPrimary point of contact and escalation point for automated testing needsli liPartner with crossorganizational agile teams to ensure endtoend test coverage is obtainedli liPrioritize the workload assign engineers to projects and provide monthly resource forecasts to project managersli liLead software engineers and Statement of Work SOW resources in automating endtoend test scripts leveraging the agile methodology li liDrive to resolve issuesimpediments to keep the agile sprint schedule on trackli liManage coordinate and communicate test virtualization solutionsli liMake enhancements to the test automation frameworkli liProvide trainingguidance to other crossorganizational agile teams in leveraging the Test Automation FrameworkbrliulThis position is NOT ELIGIBLE for relocation assistance Prospective candidates should reside in andor around the target site location or be able to commute to the site for
